actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from Army Corps of Engineers.

official_title: To direct the Army Corps of Engineers to carry out a project for streambank protection along 2.2 miles of the Tennessee River adjacent to Sequoyah Hills Park in Knoxville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to carry out a streambank protection project along 2.2 miles of the Tennessee River adjacent to Sequoyah Hills Park in Knoxville, Tennessee.

titles.title: To direct the Army Corps of Engineers to carry out a project for streambank protection along 2.2 miles of the Tennessee River adjacent to Sequoyah Hills Park in Knoxville, Tennessee.
